lenders.name: UST MicroCredit Program
lenders.occupational_info: The Center for International Studies Micro-Credit Program is dedicated to assisting micro entrepreneurs living below the poverty threshold to start income generating businesses. The Program seeks to promote freedom, fairness, and democracy around the world by endorsing basic principles of micro-entrepreneurship, self-employment, property rights, and wealth accumulation, while integrating the Catholic values of the University of St. Thomas.

lenders.occupational_info: Dennis works in the Department of Urology at Johns Hopkins Hospital.  His wife Cece is in college studying to be a school teacher and she currently works with autistic children. The photo was taken at the Christopher Street subway station in The West Grennwich Village area of New York City. The West Village has significant value to Dennis and Cece since it has been the forefront of free expression and art. The neighborhood views all people as equal and does not discriminate against persons based on gender, sexual orientation, race, creed, or religion. It is thereby one of the few "free" places on earth. The local pubs and food are spectacular as well, of course.

lenders.loan_because: the world is a global community
lenders.occupational_info: My role is to help people get a quality education.

lenders.name: Lia
lenders.loan_because: I got a gift certificate from my mom and dad for Christmas.  I think this is a very cool idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to write stories.

lenders.name: Bernadette & Michael
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I have been to the third world countries and we would like to help improve their way of life.

lenders.name: Thea
lenders.loan_because: ppl need to help each other.

lenders.name: Evan and Phil
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people be successful and make good lives for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: We should share what we have.  We all stand on the shoulders of others who have helped us!
lenders.occupational_info: I love to mentor young people because of what we learn from one another.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I have been blessed with a wonderful life. We both want to help other people be given a chance to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children who are in a hospital for emotional, mental or behavioral problems. My husband works in a solar energy plant.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.occupation: Adult/NAV Team Lead, Yahoo! Search Marketing

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people improve their lives and increase the spirit of love and compassion throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of patients with little to no kidney functon who need dialysis to continue their lives.

lenders.name: Francesco
lenders.loan_because: if we can help, then we must help.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: God put the need to help others in my way.
lenders.occupational_info: retired

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I'm sharing some of the many opportunities others have given to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work and learn with 10 year-olds and adults in a public school.

lenders.name: chris
lenders.occupational_info: teach children about nature

lenders.name: Tasha
lenders.loan_because: I'm also a small business owner & I want to help others successfully support themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I make handmade pottery and ceramic jewelry.

lenders.name: Leo
lenders.loan_because: We are ordered by Christ to feed, clothe and shelter those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good that I am contributing towards people developing their own economies.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: I am no longer loaning due to Kiva USA loaning policies.

lenders.name: Janelle
lenders.loan_because: I have been to Nigeria and have seen how difficult daily living can be.
lenders.occupational_info: I work  in school  with children who have physical and mental disabilities. I focus my attention to what abilities the children have and encourage independence.

lenders.name: E.M.C.
lenders.loan_because: I have the opportunity to help others to help themselves.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an Assistant Federal Public Defender - I defend indigent criminal defendants in federal court.  My primary focus is circuit court and supreme court appeals.

lenders.name: alex
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a hard worker but I don't give enough back.

lenders.name: Hugo
lenders.loan_because: I believe the power to help people can be used in many ways and this is one of them... Each time I can help someone, it makes me a better person and much more fullfilled.

lenders.name: Mattie
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to people in need because every one needs a push to go for something they belive in.
lenders.occupational_info: I like helping people who need love because everyone needs some once and a while.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed to have a good life.  I think it is very important to give back and help others achieve there dreams.  I think this is a wonderful way to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I meet with Doctors and Nurses to educate them on new and existing medical laboritory (blood) testing that may benift their patients.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because:
This is a fantastic organization with a realtime approach and direct solution to combat poverty.
I am so inspired with Kiva and will do anything to work with their field partners and worldwide members.
lenders.occupational_info: I market and sell apartments in New York City.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I have travelled all over the world and have seen so many people less fortunate than me. It takes so little from each person to help end poverty

lenders.name: Ayden C.
lenders.loan_because: I want people to have the chance to help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student

lenders.name: Brooke
lenders.loan_because: My dad gave me money as a gift for the holidays for here. If I ever have money I don't know what to do with (Unlikely for a teenage girl, but still possible), I want to help people. That's it, really. I just want to feel like I'm making an impact on the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student in middle school as of this year and then next year I will be graduating to high school. I take advanced classes, and I'm on the principal's list for excelling students. I hope to one day live in a city and be a writer, with acting/singing gigs on the side.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I am priviledged enough to enjoy a regular income and a steady part-time job with few worries over money. So many people in the world are not so lucky. Hopefully with the small amount I have to give I wil be able to help someone thrive in their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently employed in a theatre as a treasurer. Basically I count all the money and make sure everything is accurate. I am also told being a student is a full-time job so my degree is journalism. I hope someday to work for the BBC as a researcher or anchor.

lenders.name: Visvaldis
lenders.loan_because: Establishing and running one's own business takes courage. I appreciate people who do this, I like them to succeed.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I'm very blessed, and I'm able to.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: This is the best way for me to help people live a normal life whom otherwise would not be able to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying the social sciences program at high school in Sweden.

lenders.name: brian
lenders.loan_because: i believe in free market capitalism as the path to world peace and freedom.
lenders.occupational_info: We import and sell yachts.   Our typical customer started a small business and worked hard to succeed.  They now have the ability to cruise the world in luxury.

lenders.name: Linda & Ray
lenders.loan_because: I can.  What an easy way to lend a hand-up!

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: One person at a time, helping one person at a time, thanks to this innovative use of technology...thank you, Kiva!  I have a particular concern for helping widows and orphans overcome centuries of being treated as outcasts in many parts of the world.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive impact on women with children around the world who hope for a brighter future for their families.  I also want to influence my daughter by sharing and giving to others so she may know the full joy it can bring. Though she is only 15 months, one day she will ask about this and I want to guide her to help others whenever she can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computer software.

lenders.name: Gene & Mary
lenders.loan_because: The road to peace is created by eliminating poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell computer networking services that enable businesses to be more productive and efficient.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Financial Aid Office and help University students find a way to pay for their educational expenses.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because:
John 3:16 
My brother introduced me to Kiva 
 
"give a man a fish feed him for a day, teach a man to fish and feed him for a lifetime"
lenders.occupational_info: I work with facility managers providing floorcovering needs.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I have been blessed in having enough to take care of our family's needs. I feel it incumbent on me to offer people the helping hand they need to also have enough to take care of their families' needs. I prefer the lending system to outright donations (although I do donate to a number of charities) because I believe it's better to help people make a sustainable living.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage project portfolios (ie a whole basket of projects) for investment banks in Europe. I've been doing it for over 25 years! I am also involved in a start-up that has technology which turns waste into diesel. In our spare time (the little there is of it), hubby and I like travelling and wildlife photography.

lenders.name: Sandbox
lenders.loan_because: We are a startup and we loan because we believe the greater entrepreneurial community needs our and your support!
lenders.occupational_info: We are an award winning digital marketing agency helping companies from idea through to launch.

lenders.name: carly
lenders.loan_because: i care

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach a class of crazy fifth graders or 10 and 11 year olds.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: We all deserve a break.

lenders.name: Dennis and Barbara
lenders.loan_because: We feel that a loan makes a small contribution to the entrepreneurial spirit of people in other parts of the world (People that we wish we could know).
lenders.occupational_info: Dennis writes and Barbara publishes graphic narratives for owner-builders, design-builders, and commercial construction managers.

lenders.name: Kerry
lenders.loan_because: Money to grow a business should be available to everyone, not just those lucky enough to be born above the poverty line.
lenders.occupational_info: I help create tests to diagnose and treat cancer.

lenders.name: Lars & Lotta
lenders.loan_because: we want to make a diffrence

lenders.name: Grethe
lenders.loan_because: I think it is great when people can reach their goals!
lenders.occupational_info: Managing a travelagency

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Being a nice person leads to being a nicer person.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a fair trade clothing company based in Canada.

lenders.name: WandaW
lenders.occupational_info: I forecast the price of electricity and help people understand how electricity markets work.

lenders.name: Nienke
lenders.loan_because: Everybody can use a little help
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the department of Health, mostly on organ donation issues.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: It 's a good thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I help women who have been hurt by their husbands get themselves and their children to safety.

lenders.name: Dawn and Stephen
lenders.loan_because: We want to help motivated, enthusiastic, bright people realize their dreams and make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I create partnerships with big corporations to support the mission of public television in the USA.  Stephen represents his company before government.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with legal issues related to their job or their employees.

lenders.name: Carly Zinger
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a singer .

lenders.name: Ana
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: So others can know the rewards of being self employed.
lenders.occupational_info: Income tax preparation

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Elizabeth and Josh
lenders.loan_because: This seems like a great way to create positive change in the world and for individuals, and we are fortunate enough to be able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both scientists who study coral reefs and how humans are affecting the health of the world's reefs. We hope that our work can be used to help create positive change in how humans affect the world's oceans.

lenders.name: Henrik
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is a great way to help people that has the drive to improve their own situation and thereby also the economy in their local area
lenders.occupational_info: Investing in various businesses

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: Because I remember what it was like to need money for a small business, and because I want to extend the reach of my giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a journalist on television, radio and online.

lenders.name: Elizabeth Heuch
lenders.loan_because: I hope our small contribution can help people obtain a better life.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people and accomplished my goal to make new loans once a month during 2008. Funds I have been repaid have been re-loaned.

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: i like to help less fortunate people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Bell Canada which is a phone company located in Canada

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I served for the U.S.M.C. in Somalia in 1994 as a machine gunner. My views of life have changed forever for the better!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: It was very hard labor for the US government.

lenders.name: Nina
lenders.loan_because: My wonderful childen gave me this Christmasgift. I believe in helping people by giving them a way to support themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children from 10-13 years of age.
